meanings.definition: A narrow horizontal surface projecting from a wall or cliff.
meanings.sent1: The bird perched on the ledge.
meanings.sent2: She carefully walked along the ledge of the building.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found a cozy spot on the ledge to enjoy its acorn.
meanings.sent4: The ledge jutted out like a welcoming arm from the rock face.
meanings.sent5: The ledge overlooked a breathtaking view of the valley below.

meanings.definition: A shelf or projection resembling a ledge.
meanings.sent1: He placed the books neatly on the ledge.
meanings.sent2: The decorative ledge added charm to the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a sunny spot on the ledge to nap.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a ledge of comfort in a sea of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The ledge held memories of adventures and laughter.

meanings.definition: A layer or stratum of rock.
meanings.sent1: The geologist studied the ledge for clues about the earth's history.
meanings.sent2: The miners discovered a rich vein of ore in the ledge.
meanings.sent3: The ants built their nest within the crevices of the ledge.
meanings.sent4: The ledge revealed the passage of time through its distinct layers.
meanings.sent5: The ledge crumbled under the weight of the boulder.
